___verbose.description: Adds more details to output logging.

___namedChunks.description: Use file name for lazy loaded chunks.

___lazyModules.description: List of additional NgModule files that will be lazy loaded. Lazy router modules with be discovered automatically.

___main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

___poll.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.

___i18nFile.description: Localization file to use for i18n.

___outputHashing.description: Define the output filename cache-busting hashing mode.

___extractLicenses.description: Extract all licenses in a separate file, in the case of production builds only.

___i18nMissingTranslation.description: How to handle missing translations for i18n.

___stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors

___includePaths.description: Paths to include. Paths will be resolved to project root.

___i18nFormat.description: Format of the localization file specified with --i18n-file.

___forkTypeChecker.description: Run the TypeScript type checker in a forked process.

___showCircularDependencies.description: Show circular dependency warnings on builds.

___statsJson.description: Generates a 'stats.json' file which can be analyzed using tools such as: #webpack-bundle-analyzer' or https: //webpack.github.io/analyse.

___commonChunk.description: Use a separate bundle containing code used across multiple bundles.

___bundleDependencies.description: Available on server platform only. Which external dependencies to bundle into the module. By default, all of node_modules will be kept as requires.

___progress.description: Log progress to the console while building.

___preserveSymlinks.description: Do not use the real path when resolving modules.

___fileReplacements.description: Replace files with other files in the build.

___tsConfig.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

___optimization.description: Defines the optimization level of the build.

___vendorChunk.description: Use a separate bundle containing only vendor libraries.

___outputPath.description: Path where output will be placed.
